title: who
Lyrics:
40 ContributorsTranslationsالعربيةFrançaisРусскийDeutschItalianoTürkçeУкраїнськаEspañolWho Lyrics[Chorus]
We never met, but she's all I see at night

Wanna give her the world and so much more
Who is my heart waiting for?

[Verse 1]
If every day I think about her
Yeah, every day of my life
Then tell me why I haven't found her
(Why, why, why, why, why?)

[Pre-Chorus]
There's so many people to see (There's so many people to see)
And places to go (There's so many places to go)
I still haven't found your love

[Chorus]

Wanna give her the world and so much more

[Verse 2]

I'll put it all on the line
I'll be that someone she can count on

Is she somewhere a thousand miles away?
Wanna give her the world and so much more
Who is my heart waiting for?

title: like crazy

28 ContributorsTranslationsRomanizationEnglishEspañolDeutschРусскийPortuguêsالعربيةFrançaisLike Crazy Lyrics[지민 "Like Crazy" 가사]

[Intro]
(I think we could last forever

Just trust me)

[Verse 1]
She's saying
Baby, 생각하지 마

있어 줘 오늘까지만

드라마 같은 뻔한 story

You know, I know (Ooh)

Lost in the lights

Lyrics:
11 ContributorsTranslations中文EnglishRomanizationEspañolTürkçeРусскийItalianoالعربيةSmeraldo Garden Marching Band Lyrics[지민 "Smeraldo Garden Marching Band" ft. 로꼬 가사]

다가갈게 너에게

난 못 멈춰 (Can't stop)

함께할 거야 (All for you)

Ooh, I want you, babe
I wanna hold your hand
I want you, babe (Take it to the bridge)

모두가 제자리에

title: closer than this
Lyrics:
13 ContributorsTranslationsRomanizationEnglishPortuguêsالعربيةEspañolفارسیFrançaisItalianoCloser Than This Lyrics[지민 "Closer Than This" 가사]

[Verse 1]
너도 기억하니?
우리 첫 만남이?
수줍고 어색했던 그때
문득 돌아보니
어느새 여기까지
함께 걸어왔던 거야
때론 넘어져 울기도 하고
서로의 어깰 토닥여 주고
눈물로 여울져 바라보며
서로의 이름을 불러줬지
6월 13일 그날부터
오늘의 지금까지 너와 난
Even if you're not here
같은 자리에 always

[Pre-Chorus]
Don’t have to worry now
잠시 이 손을 놓지만
작은 쉼표일 뿐인걸 (Ah-ah-ah, ah)
Just call my name out loud
다시 보랏빛 물들 그날

[Chorus]
'Cause anytime you want me (I'll be)
Right here where you call me (I’ll be)
I could never let you go
Never let you go
Whenever you need me (I'll be)
If you believe me (I'll be)
I'll never let you go
Never let you go


[Verse 2]
비가 내리면 비 맞으며 노래하던 그때를 기억할게
눈이 내리면 눈 맞으며 웃어주던 널 추억하며
다시 만날 봄날에 못다 한 얘길 전할게
My love, my babe, 영원히 네 곁에
일곱은 하나, right, 두근거려 지금도 하나의 마음
잠깐 눈을 감아 눈앞에 서 있을게, oh, ooh-woah-oh

[Pre-Chorus]
Don't have to worry now
잠시 이 손을 놓지만
작은 쉼표일 뿐인걸 (Ah-ah-ah, ah)
Just call my name out loud
다시 보랏빛 물들 그날

Never let you go

그 웃음으로 문을 열어줘
멈췄던 시간이 돌아오면
Baby, I’ll come back to you


[Chorus]
다 함께 부르자 이 노래 (Ooh-ooh)

I could never let you go (Never let you go)
